message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!

I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more!
I'm not getting any younger, so I'd like to get a bit more. How about this?
I'm not going down without a fight! I think I deserve more than that!
I'm not going to back down either. I think I deserve more than 40% of the pie.
I'm not going to give up! I think I deserve more than that! It's now or never!
I'm not going to let you have all the fun. I'm making a strong move now. Take it or leave it!
This is my final offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Take it or leave it!
You've made it clear you're not willing to budge. I'll take what I can get. This is my final offer.
